title: China Partnering Award: Agri-Bioscience for Sustainable Food Security
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
findingsText: This is a networking grant, but it facilitated a successful collaboration with colleagues in China and a research project that has revealed that a 'good' densovirus protects a global crop pest (Helicoverpa armigera) against biopesticides. Manipulation of insects microbial communities might enhance biopesticide activity. Agriculture, Food and Drink,Environment
